Celestial Titan

The Celestial Titan is a colossal entity whose presence within The Celestial Plane is utterly pervasive. The titan is a living vessel, perhaps a manifestation of a God, though it is entirely passive and not wholly corporeal. Where it manifests physically, or at least visibly, within The Celestial Plane, it bears the distinctive traits of an arthropod, with great, sweeping flanks of bright white chitin, tufts of poly-chromatic hair, and laced or feathered wings.

Celestial Eidolons
